summary: Adds in a companion bassed on the Kaleen Race, who lives off in her own little camp.
descriptionHtml:
Currently you need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797] Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0[/url] For her hair.

Adds in the Kaleen Companion Faydrin. She has her own camp up on the North end of Skyrim.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/a24zuNN.jpg[/img]
She can be found near the Wreck of the Brinehammer (West of Dawnstar along the coast), at her own little camp, in which she'll wander about and defend.
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52527-4-1396149641.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2uio0DD.jpg[/img]

Faydrin will do a mix of fire magic and dual wield, and has light step and decent sneaking ability, so she won't be setting off any traps while exploring.

She can be married if one is inclined, and will hang about at her tent (it is her 'home' after all.)

[size=4][b]Credits[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797]Pony Tail Hairstyle[/url] by azarkiowa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url] By alt3rn1ty and
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/?]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url] by navetsea For the body texture mix
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48329/?]Character Mod Resource Pack[/url] By Nuska - For the face textures.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female textures[/url] by hellosanta
- Used for part of body.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character edit[/url] by tktk1
For the facegen.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]UNP Body[/url] By dimon99
author: No user here
